1.title: Adversity

episode of.title: LA Kings: 2014 Stanley Cup Moments (TV Mini-Series 2014– )

1.plot: After entering the 2014 season with high expectations, the Kings battled through the adversity of losing goaltender Jonathan Quick to injury.

2.title: The Deadline

episode of.title: LA Kings: 2014 Stanley Cup Moments (TV Mini-Series 2014– )

2.plot: The Kings looked to recharge their offense heading into the Olympic break with the acquisition of sniper Marian Gaborik at the trade deadline.

3.title: The Comeback

episode of.title: LA Kings: 2014 Stanley Cup Moments (TV Mini-Series 2014– )

3.plot: After falling behind 3-0 to the San Jose in the first round, the LA Kings make history becoming only the fourth team to come back and defeat the Sharks.

4.title: Freeway Face-Off

episode of.title: LA Kings: 2014 Stanley Cup Moments (TV Mini-Series 2014– )

4.plot: Long-time California rivals, the Anaheim Ducks and the LA Kings meet for the first time in playoff history.

5.title: The Rematch

episode of.title: LA Kings: 2014 Stanley Cup Moments (TV Mini-Series 2014– )

5.plot: The Kings and Blackhawks meet again in the Western Conference Final for a 7-game series many called the best playoff hockey in decades.

6.title: The Finals

episode of.title: LA Kings: 2014 Stanley Cup Moments (TV Mini-Series 2014– )

6.plot: The LA Kings return to the Stanley Cup Finals for the second time in three years taking on the New York Rangers. Justin Williams comes up the hero scoring the overtime winner in game 1.

7.title: The Captain

episode of.title: LA Kings: 2014 Stanley Cup Moments (TV Mini-Series 2014– )

7.plot: The Kings face another grueling match-up with the New York Rangers in game 2 of the Stanley Cup Final. It's the Captain, Dustin Brown, that becomes the hero in double overtime.

8.title: Champions

episode of.title: LA Kings: 2014 Stanley Cup Moments (TV Mini-Series 2014– )

8.plot: In double overtime, Alec Martinez scores one of the most iconic goals in LA Kings history to win the franchises' second Stanley Cup in three years.

9.title: Mr. Game 7

episode of.title: LA Kings: 2014 Stanley Cup Moments (TV Mini-Series 2014– )

9.plot: Known as Mr. Game 7, Justin Williams showed up in every big game during the 2014 playoffs earning him the Conn Smythe as playoff MVP.

10.title: The Stanley Cup

episode of.title: LA Kings: 2014 Stanley Cup Moments (TV Mini-Series 2014– )

10.plot: Watch the LA Kings lift the most iconic trophy in sports for the second time in three years, the Stanley Cup.

11.title: The Voices

episode of.title: LA Kings: 2014 Stanley Cup Moments (TV Mini-Series 2014– )

11.plot: The voices of the Los Angeles Kings, Bob Miller and Nick Nickson, talk about their 2014 Stanley Cup championship calls.

12.title: The Celebrations

episode of.title: LA Kings: 2014 Stanley Cup Moments (TV Mini-Series 2014– )

12.plot: Join the players in the locker room moments after winning and ride along with the team for both parades as the LA Kings celebrate their second Stanley Cup in three seasons.

imdb.plot outline: Before the LA Kings were crowned the 2014 Stanley Cup Champions, they endured an incredible journey of adversity and comebacks. The familiar faces of the LA Kings players, staff and management tell their side of the story in Kings Vision's 2014 Stanley Cup Moments.
imdb.title: LA Kings: 2014 Stanley Cup Moments
akas: LA Kings: 2014 Stanley Cup Moments (United States)
plot: Before the LA Kings were crowned the 2014 Stanley Cup Champions, they endured an incredible journey of adversity and comebacks. The familiar faces of the LA Kings players, staff and management tell their side of the story in Kings Vision's 2014 Stanley Cup Moments.
